line.text: Alas tis true I have gone here and there
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And made my self a motley to the view
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Gored mine own thoughts sold cheap what is most dear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Made old offences of affections new
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Most true it is that I have looked on truth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Askance and strangely but by all above
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: These blenches gave my heart another youth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And worse essays proved thee my best of love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Now all is done have what shall have no end
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Mine appetite I never more will grind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: On newer proof to try an older friend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A god in love to whom I am confined
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then give me welcome next my heaven the best
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Even to thy pure and most most loving breast
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
